title: Game keeps on crashing
body:
everytime i tries to reconnect to my game, it just crashes and goes back to game crash reconnect screen.

btw this is happens after champ select where u load the game, it just crash and crash everytime i tries to reconnect

replies.body:
I should be able to help out, but I would need a bit more information first.  When do you first get this issue?  Is it in the loading screen?  Or do you not experience any issues until you get into the game itself? Additionally, when you say it "crashes", what happens exactly?  Do you get an error message?  Does the entire game lock up?  Provide as much detailed info as possible!

Reply back and let me know!

I get the error message saying that I'm not connected and then I get the stupid "leaving buster". It's not my fault that Riot's server is preventing me from playing the game. I shouldn't get punished for how I'm being treated.
same, but i dont have the leave buster yet but im pretty sure quite a lot of people reported me
It's still not your fault if the Riot's servers are preventing you and punishing you.

So after champion select, there is this loading screen right? and then it just goes black, after a bit, it just crashes and reconnect screen pops up, everytime i tries to reconnect, it just wont work. i reinstalled league and change my running performence and everything that i read and watch about this and i tried to repair but nothing worked so far :/

Just to clarify, are you running LoLReplay at all?  We've seen a lot of reports that this program is causing these crashes with the latest patch.  If you are, make sure to temporarily uninstall it to see if this resolves the issue.

Reply back and let me know!
i installed lolreplay but never even used it XD

got same problem press play go to aram find team time ends game should start but it crashes and says game crashed please recconect once you press reconnect it goes back to the same message already waited for 3h still same got leaving busters for afk uninstalled and installed tried to repair tried everything i could think of but its not helping! this only started happening after the 6.10 patch before my league of legends was fine with no problems :)
this is screenshot of what im getting http://prntscr.com/b5okll already lost 1 ranked because of this issue and left 3 arams because i cant join the game,.....
